price: ያ ቢሻ ከዚህ (ካሉት) የተሻለን ከሥሮቻቸው ወንዞች የሚፈሱባቸውን አትክልቶች ላንተ የሚያደርግልህ ሕንጻ ቤቶችንም ላንተ የሚያደርግልህ ጌታ ችሮታው በዛ፡፡
arabic: تَبَارَكَ ٱلَّذِيٓ إِن شَآءَ جَعَلَ لَكَ خَيۡرٗا مِّن ذَٰلِكَ جَنَّٰتٖ تَجۡرِي مِن تَحۡتِهَا ٱلۡأَنۡهَٰرُ وَيَجۡعَل لَّكَ قُصُورَۢا

version.title: Amharic translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Amharic by Muhammad Sadeq and Muhammad Ath-Thany Habib. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: tabāraka alladhī in shāa jaʿala laka khayran min dhālika jannātin tajrī min taḥtihā al-anhāru wayajʿal laka quṣūran
